verses.verse: Ho, <S%H1945><s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H6771>thirsteth,<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%> ye to the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and he <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3701>money;<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%> ye, <S%H7666>buy,<s%> and <S%H398>eat;<s%> yea, <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4242>price.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> do ye <S%H8254>spend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for that which is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3899>bread?<s%> and your <S%H3018>labor<s%> for that which <S%H7654>satisfieth<s%> <S%H3808>not?<s%> hearken <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> ye that which is <S%H2896>good,<s%> and let your <S%H5315>soul<s%> delight <S%H6026>itself<s%> in <S%H1880>fatness.<s%>

Incline <S%H5186><s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, even the <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3816>people,<s%> a <S%H5057>leader<s%> and <S%H6680>commander<s%> to the <S%H3816>people.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> and <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thee shall <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee <S%H4616>because<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and for the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H6286>glorified<s%> thee.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> while he may be <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> ye upon him while he <S%H1961>is<s%> near: <S%H7138><s%>

Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4284>thoughts:<s%> and let him <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon him; and <S%H413>to<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he will <S%H7235>abundantly<s%> <S%H5545>pardon.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> are your <S%H1870>ways<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are my ways <S%H1361>higher<s%> <S%H1870><s%> than your <S%H4480>ways,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> than your <S%H4480>thoughts.<s%> <S%H4284><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%> cometh <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H7950>snow<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7725>returneth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H7301>watereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and maketh it bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> and <S%H6779>bud,<s%> that it may <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H2232>sower,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the eater: <S%H398><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall my <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H4480>mouth:<s%> <S%H6310><s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me <S%H7387>void,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> it shall <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H2654>please,<s%> and it shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in the thing <S%H834>whereto<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> ye shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and be led <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H7965>peace:<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall break <S%H6476>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Instead <S%H8478><s%> of the <S%H5285>thorn<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the fir <S%H1265>tree,<s%> and <S%H8478>instead<s%> of the <S%H5636>brier<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the myrtle <S%H1918>tree:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H8034>name,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> that shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
